Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Fire an Assault Rifle at the target.
使用突击步枪攻击目标。
Fire a MX-2000 Rifle at the target.
使用 MX-2000 步枪攻击目标。
Fire a Gatling Gun at the target.
使用加特林机枪攻击目标。

Allows the unit to fire electrified ammunition to deal Arc damage and have a 12[StrengthWave/] chance (8[StrengthWave/] for repeating attacks) to inflict [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for 3[turn/].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of ammunition can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
使单位能够发射电能弹药，造成电弧伤害并有 12[StrengthWave/] 力量几率（多次攻击为 8[StrengthWave/]）对非虚灵单位施加[abilityred]触电[/abilityred]，持续 3[turn/]。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种弹药。[/productioncol]

Allows the unit to fire flechette ammunition, which has a 12[StrengthPhysical/] chance (8[StrengthPhysical/] for repeating attacks) to inflict [abilityred]Bleeding[/abilityred] on Cyborg and Biological units for 3[turn/].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of ammunition can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
使单位能够发射箭弹弹药，攻击时有 12[StrengthPhysical/] 几率（重复攻击有 8[StrengthPhysical/] 几率）对半机械人和生物单位施加[abilityred]流血[/abilityred]，持续 3[turn/]。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种弹药。[/productioncol]
Advanced accelerators built into the weapon stabilize the shot. Firearms attacks have {accuracyboost} accuracy and {rangeboost} extra range.
内置于武器中的高级加速器可提高武器稳定性，枪炮攻击获得 {accuracyboost} 准度并额外获得 {rangeboost} 射程。

Allows the unit to fire incendiary ammunition to deal Thermal damage and have a 12[StrengthThermal/] chance (8[StrengthThermal/] for repeating attacks) to set non-Ethereal and non-Mineral targets on fire, causing [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] for 3[turn/].[br/][br/]Attacks deal 75% of their damage to adjacent units.[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of ammunition can be active at any time.[/productioncol]

使单位能够发射燃烧弹药，造成热能伤害并有 12[StrengthThermal/] 力量几率（多次攻击为 8[StrengthThermal/]）点燃非虚灵和非矿物目标，使其[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 3[turn/]。[br/][br/]攻击还会对相邻单位造成 75% 的伤害。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种弹药。[/productioncol]

Firearms attacks have a {StrengthSingle}[StrengthPhysical/] strength chance ({ChanceRepeat}[StrengthPhysical/] for repeating attacks) to cause [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred] for {duration}[turn/] on the primary target while [abilityred]Staggering[/abilityred] adjacent units with High Impact.
枪炮攻击有 {StrengthSingle}[StrengthPhysical/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {ChanceRepeat}[StrengthPhysical/] 几率）向主目标施加[abilityred]震荡[/abilityred]，持续 {duration}[turn/]，此外还会以高度冲击[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]相邻单位。
Fire a Shotgun at the target.
Fire a Pistol at the target.
A powerful machine gun for an aircraft
飞行器使用的强力机枪
Fire the Defense Gun at the target.
使用防御机枪攻击目标。
Fires the Railgun at the target.
Gives the unit a Rail Gun.
Fire the Vorpal Sniper rifle at the target.
使用夺命狙击枪攻击目标。
Fire an overpowering shot, intending to stun the target.
发射用于眩晕目标的强力射击。
A quick shot that fires a blinding flash round.
快速发射能够令人致盲的闪光子弹。
Fire a Disassembler Shot at the ground with 1 hex radius area of effect.
向地面发射拆解炮弹，对 1 个单元格范围造成影响。

Replaces the Disassembler shell with a Toxic variant. It now leaves behind a cloud of Toxic Nanites that deal {ToxinHazardDamage} damage to enemy units standing in it, as well as having a {ToxicHazardChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Debilitating Infection[/abilityred] to Biological or Cyborg units.
将拆解弹药替换为剧毒弹药，现在弹药发射后将留下一片毒雾，站在毒雾中的敌方单位将受到 {ToxinHazardDamage} 伤害，同时有 {ToxicHazardChance} 力量几率对生物或半机械人单位施加[abilityred]衰弱感染[/abilityred]。
Fire a ship mounted Railgun at the target unit.
向目标单位发射舰载轨道炮。
Fire a wrecking shot at the target.
Fire a ship mounted Cannon at the target unit.
向目标单位发射舰载加农炮。

Upgrades Firearms so that rounds travel in a modified dimensional phase, allowing them to bypass {ShieldBypass}[shield/] and ignore {LoSIgnore}% of the accuracy penalties from line of sight and units in the way.
升级枪炮，使其子弹能够穿越经过修改的维度相位，忽视 {ShieldBypass}[shield/]，并无视 {LoSIgnore}% 因视线和阻挡单位造成的准度惩罚。
Bypass {ShieldBypass} and ignore {LoSIgnore}% of line of sight and unit in the way penalties.
忽视 {ShieldBypass}，并且无视 {LoSIgnore}% 因视线和阻挡单而造成的惩罚。
Fire a Spike Gun at the target. Damage increases by {DamageIncrease} when unit stands within a Trench.
使用钉枪攻击目标。如果目标位于壕沟，造成的伤害提高 {DamageIncrease}。
Fire the Autocannons at the target.
使用自动加农炮攻击目标。
Fire Support Guns at the target.
Fire the Rotary Cannon at the target.
使用旋转加农炮攻击目标。
Fire Defense Cannons at the target.
使用防御加农炮攻击目标。
Fire the Naval Rotary Cannon at the target.
使用海军旋转加农炮攻击目标。
Fire Rotary Cannons all around the vessel, hitting every adjacent unit.
使用旋转加农炮向舰船四周开火，攻击所有相邻目标。
Fire at the target with a mounted gun.
Fires a high volume of kinetic projectiles at the target.
向目标发射大量动能射弹。
Fire the sniper rifle at the target.
使用狙击步枪攻击目标。
Fire Imperial Mounted Gun at the target.
使用帝国搭载炮攻击目标。
自动相位控制战车搭载加农炮
Fire a Mounted Cannon at a target.
对相邻单位造成 {DamagePercentage}% 伤害。
Fire twin light machine guns at the target hex, dealing Kinetic damage.
使用轻型双机枪攻击目标单元格，造成动能伤害。
Deals {Percentage}% of its damage to units in a {HexRad} hex radius.
对 {HexRad} 单元格范围内的单位造成自身伤害值的 {Percentage}%。
Fire a Heavy Spike Gun at the target.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
